name: Andrew Ivimey
introduction: Andrew is an actor, voice over artist, comedian, writer, and co-creator of The From Superheroes Network. He does it all! (I do it all, I'm writing this in 3rd person for some reason).You may have seen Andrew on TV shows like The Beaverton, Remedy, and Perfect Storms. Or you may recognize his voice from national ad campaigns for Coors Light, No Frills, and Moosehead.As a stand-up comedian he has performed at The Second City, NXNE festival, Just For Laughs, Edmonton Comedy Festival, JFL42, and can be heard nationally on SirusXM radio. With his standout nerdy style Andrew has opened for acts such as Janeane Garofalo, James Adomian, Aisha Tyler, Todd Glass, Greg Behrendt, Greg Proops, and Matt Braunger.Andrew also hosts the award-nominated Talk From Superheroes Podcast where he has interviewed guests such as Charlie Cox (Daredevil), Deborah Ann Woll (Daredevil) and Robbie Amell (The Flash/X-Files) and appeared as a panelist at events such as Nerd Nite Toronto and Fan Expo Canada.
